full_text: I want to express sincere condolences to all British people on the sad passing of His Royal Highness Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh. Our thoughts and solidarity are with you on a very sad day for the United Kingdom.

@Irishchutzpah I assure you that in my view no action in human history is more shameful than the holocaust. Full solidarity with #YomHashoah2021.  My support for UNRWA funding is an entirely separate issue, based on alleviating human misery.

Further very disturbing scenes this evening in Belfast. Attacks on police, journalists and citizens must be condemned by all.  There are peaceful, democratic and legal channels to address all issues and concerns. Calm and positive leadership needed from all. https://t.co/KTpO587ssf
